title: Siberian Assault
description: Siberian Assault is an intense first-person shooter set deep in the unforgiving Siberian wilderness, where players are dropped into a hostile winter jungle brimming with enemy forces. As an elite operative, your mission is to survive relentless waves of enemies in this icy, snow-laden environment.
instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

title: Cat Evolution
description: Cat Evolution is a fun parkour game. You will play as a cat, as a carnivore, collecting pieces of meat for you to evolve faster, light vegetables will degrade you. Also, don't forget to collect diamonds, which can be used for upgrades! Evolve from a cat to a tiger or even farther to the finish line to conquer the animals!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Elemental Gloves Magic Power
description: Elemental Gloves - Magic Power is a superpower arcade game. Experience the fun of superpowers in magic games? Fascinated by elemental games? In this game, you can use the superpowers in the magic gloves to fight with your enemies. Shooting with flames, attacking with lightning, and attacking with electromagnetic waves, are three ways for you to choose. Don't hesitate to take the opportunity to practice real elemental magic and wipe out the bad guys. Become the greatest elemental master!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Parking Fury 3D: Beach City 2
description: Parking Fury 3D: Beach City 2 takes you to a vibrant town by the beach where you can test your driving and parking skills in a variety of supercars. Complete challenging parking missions while exploring the scenic coastal streets. You can switch cars on the map, but watch out for the police - get caught stealing a vehicle, and it’s game over! Can you master the art of parking in Beach City without getting busted?
instructions: Arrow keys to drive and balance. Press CTRL to enter cars. Follow the arrows from the mini-map to the destination.

title: Earthquake io
description: Earthquake io is a realistic 3D physics-based disaster simulator in which you take control of the forces of the Earth to destroy cities, destroy buildings and crush all small objects to compete with other players in a fierce battle.
instructions: The goal of the game is to destroy the entire city, surpassing the other players in size. Control on a mobile device: swipe. PC control: LMB

title: Gross Out Run
description: Gross Out Run is a parkour game. Compete against two other AI runners and the first player to reach the finish line wins! Be careful, you have to avoid the sledgehammers on the road, which will block your progress and stain your clothes simultaneously. It's time to make a change! Can you get to the finish line first and keep yourself tidy?
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Chicken Strike
description: Meet the new exciting third-person shooter - Chicken Strike! Here you will act as a brave chicken who fights with opponents in different conditions. Buy a variety of skins to make your chicken unique. Enjoy jumping like a real chicken. Get ready for intense battles and become a true chicken champion!
instructions: W, A, S, D - walk Space - jump R - reload 1, 2 - change weapons F - weapon selection 3, 4 - grenades P - pause LMB - shoot, throw a grenade RMB - aim on a sniper Tab - leaderboard

title: Car Park Simulator
description: Welcome to Car Park Simulator, Are you ready to test your driving skills and master the art of parking? Navigate through 72 challenging levels filled with obstacles and narrow spaces...
instructions: Use the cursor keys to move and steer the car or use the on-screen buttons to navigate the car to the target parking spot.

title: Stumble Guys
description: Stumble Guys is a very hot adventure elimination game. A variety of fun levels await your challenge, and the time has come to test your memory and dexterity! Run, sprint, and slide to overtake your opponents and dodge the obstacles that keep popping up. Can you survive to the end? Invite your friends to join you and kill them all!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: BFFs Golden Hour
description: Fall is here and the BFFs decided to take the perfect photos with their Instagram-worthy makeup and outfits. Elsa, Ellie, Kiki, and Regina are all in charge of getting amazing images for their fall aesthetics album, so make sure you come and join them in their BFFs Golden Hour dress up game for girls! Help them get ready by dressing them up with a variety of beautiful outfits, accessories and makeup styles then snap the most instagrammable pictures you need for their album. Enjoy playing!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

title: Slenderman Back to School
description: On a very mysterious night you wake up and find yourself trapped in your high school, a town in Massachusetts, and you will have to survive until dawn and escape from the urban legend Slenderman. In Slenderman Back to School, a 3D online game, you will be able to feel the adrenaline that a horror game feels like.
instructions: Instructions: Don't stop running and looking for clues, objects, items that will help you survive this night of terror in the old school where the fearsome Slenderman usually appears. Controls: WASD to move Spacebar to jump Mouse to aim and move the camera F to interact

title: Stick Ninja Survival
description: Play Stick Ninja Survival online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Nitro Speed Car Racing
description: Nitro Speed Car Racing is a very unique racing game. You need to focus on the pointer on the dial and stop it at the right moment to get the Nitro that can help you rush to the finish line. This is a test of your quick reaction ability. Of course, you can use the coins you collected in the game to upgrade your engine and nitro. Come to a brain contest, stimulate your dopamine, and challenge your reflex limit!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: LampHead
description: The main character of this game is an amazing man with a lamp instead of a head who needs to get out of a dark and dangerous strange place at any cost. Are you ready to prove that you have an outstanding reaction, maneuvering between sharp obstacles, collecting bonuses, remembering that at the end of each dark path the light of victory awaits you? We are ready to offer you a one-time runner in which tedious jumps are replaced by moving the main character between two equal planes.
instructions: The goal of the game is to run as long as possible without encountering obstacles. Control on a mobile device: touch/swipe. Desktop Control: Left Mouse Button.

title: Baby Piano Children Song
description: Do you like playing musical instruments? If you love music, we have just the game for you. This educational game offers 5 musical instruments to choose from. They are piano, xylophone, flute, drums, and guitar. You can select the instrument you are interested in playing. Apart from offering a wide range of instruments, this game lets you choose your favorite music.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Solitaire Klondike
description: Step into the timeless challenge of Solitaire Klondike, an addictive HTML5 card game designed for fans of classic solitaire. Enjoy hours of relaxing gameplay with this popular version of Klondike Solitaire, where players arrange cards in descending order and alternate colors to win. If you need a fresh start, simply shuffle new cards to explore different winning strategies! Perfect for anyone who loves solitaire, Solitaire Klondike combines strategy, patience, and quick thinking.
instructions: With four foundation spots at the top, you’ll need to sort each suit—Clubs, Hearts, Diamonds, and Spades—in ascending order. Track your progress with time and move counters that challenge you to improve each game, making every move count. For an extra boost, Solitaire Klondike offers helpful power-ups, including Hint, Solver, and Undo options. Customize your experience with a variety of game skins to keep the visual experience fresh and engaging.

title: Stellar Fusion
description: Enter the captivating universe of Celestia — As the stellar Alchemist, you alone possess the power to restore cosmic balance. Manipulate essences represented by vibrant tiles and solve intricate puzzles to restore balance in Stellar Fusion!
instructions: Click on groups of 3+ tiles of the same colour to destroy them. Clicking on a smaller group will cost you a life, but can still be a valid move. Power-ups will help you along the way. Action Mode: Be as fast as possible to gather the required amount of stellar energy! Puzzle Mode: Clean the whole matrix to pass the level!

title: Call of the Jungle! Animal Evolution
description: Feel like the king of the jungle in this casual 3D runner about wild animals. Feed your hungry pet only the right food so that it develops. Collect crystals, level up your character and become the king of beasts in this free online game! Dive into the exciting world of animals, where your pet will become a real king of beasts. In this exciting casual online game, you have to feed your animal so that it can grow and evolve. Go through exciting races and challenges in the wild jungle.
instructions: **Your goal is to run to the end of the level and collect the coolest beast. Feed your pet only meat so that it grows and evolves. Avoid traps, collect crystals and choose the right gates to earn more points. **Controls: - On a smartphone. Move your finger on the screen right and left - Move the mouse while holding down the left button or press the arrows on the keyboard.

title: Mask Evolution 3d
description: Mask Evolution 3D is a parkour game. Move the masks through digital gates to boost the value of your mask. You can also collect decorations and attendants to make your mask even more artistic. Finally, auction your masks to sell them for a high price and earn more money. Please note,be careful of obstacles such as spikes on the road, they will devalue your mask and you will fail when your mask value is 0. Get ready for an exciting journey to make your very own mask!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Screw Jam - Fun Puzzle Game
description: Remove screws in correct order to get rid of the boards. Match the removed screws and complete the level. Test yourself with this amazing brain teaser!
instructions: Let's embark on a mechanical journey like no other in Screw Pin - Jam Puzzle. Your mission is to untwist screws and put them in the right screw boxes. You win when completing all the screw sets. Unscrew them all now!

title: Sandwich Runner
description: Sandwich Runner is a fun game. Collect ingredients on the way to the goal, how high will it reach? The diner is very hungry and he can't wait to eat. Collect steaks, chicken thighs, fried eggs, and sushi. Be careful to avoid bad food like mold and rot or it will make the diner sick! Red peppers will make the diner spitfire! Can you keep the diner happy and pass the level? Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Lava Ladder Leap
description: Lava Ladder Leap: A thrilling endless runner where players climb a castle tower escaping rising lava. Dodge traps and compete against friends in single or 2player local multiplayer modes. Survive as long as possible or be the last one standing. Game Modes: Single-Player: In this mode, players must survive for as long as possible. Two-Player: This competitive mode pits two players against each other. The first player to fall into the lava loses, and the remaining player emerges victorious.
instructions: 1Player :- A & D - Movement, W - Jump, W & S - Climb/Decline Ladder V - Dash, B - Punch 2Player :- Left Arrow & Right Arrow :- Movement, Up Arrow - Jump, Up Arrow & Down Arrow - Climb/Decline Ladder, K - Dash, L - Punch

title: Mad Truck
description: Are you good at challenging the balanced platforms and ramps? Mad Truck provides you with a driving simulation game. In the Level mode, you need to keep the car stable at the side. In the challenge Level mode, you can drive the car to overpass different obstacles at the normal view. All levels require players to reach the finish line as soon as possible. If you can complete the level at the marked time, you can win all 3 yellow stars.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Motor Tour
description: In Motor tour, the ultimate racing game, you'll experience an unforgettable adrenaline-pumping adventure with multiple modes to choose from. Take on fierce competitors, embark on an endless journey, or take things up a notch by daringly weaving through traffic with heart-stopping near misses. Don't wait any longer, start playing now and immerse yourself in this epic experience that is sure to leave you on the edge of your seat!
instructions: W = forward A = Left D = Right S = Brake Shift = Nitro ESC = Back -Upgrade your motor for an edge over your competition. -Play online or endless mode for more cash. -Watch ads for quick boosts in cash, gold, or blueprints. -Drive in the opposite direction for bonus points, but be careful not to crash!

title: Basket Shot
description: Anyone may enjoy the swelteringly popular arcade game Basket Shot! Become the next basketball superstar by shooting baskets and unlocking new balls!
instructions: Drag to play!

title: Bullet Heroes
description: Join the ultimate team-based shooting game! Team up with players worldwide to strategize, outsmart, and dominate your enemies. Experience intense firefights on stunning high-definition 3D maps, with multiple game modes and a vast arsenal of weapons. Become an elite agent, master your skills, and lead your team to victory. Dive into the action and enjoy the thrill of cooperative gameplay. Are you ready to become a hero?
instructions: This is a team competitive shooting game with a very fun operation experience. We need to cooperate with teammates to defeat the opponent. We also need to survive in the hail of bullets. Come and experience it together, heroes. There are multiple modes, multiple weapons, and multiple maps in the game, including high-definition 3D maps for you to experience Controls: PC: Use WASD to move and mouse to aim and shoot Mobile: Swipe on screen to move and click on buttons to do actions

title: SUIKA WATERMELON DROP
description: Engage, merge, and challenge yourself in this thrilling fruit-matching journey! Drop and collide identical fruits to evolve them, preventing them from falling out of the box. But here's the exciting twist: every time matching fruits collide, they transform into a completely new one. Can you keep merging your way up to the ultimate prize, the grand watermelon? The challenge awaits!
instructions: drag to move fruit and click to drop fruit. Merge same fruits to evolve!

title: Zombie Outbreak Survive
description: With this entertaining game you will have to run throughout the city, run and shoot because the zombies are fast and dangerous, they will not stop chasing you to devour you.The zombie apocalypse has arrived and the terror of surviving has arrived with this new game. Zombie Outbreak Survive is a 3D game with impressive and realistic graphics that will make your hair stand on end and you will feel the true fear of being devoured.
instructions: Instructions: Run to survive, look for a clear place and shoot all the zombies before they grab you and devour you. Controls: WASD to move Spacebar to jump Mouse to aim and shoot

title: Rolling Balls Sea Race
description: Designed for those who love ball games with realistic physics and elements, the goal of this game is to roll to the finish line without falling into the water. Master the control of the ball and collect coins on your route to unlock new balls, tail tracks and sky packages. You can play the game in 1 player mode or 2 player racing mode. Enjoy realistic nature, physics and effects in dozens of different levels!
instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS"

title: Butterfly Kyodai Deluxe 2
description: The beloved classic returns! In Butterfly Kyodai Deluxe 2, connect matching butterflies in this beautifully refreshed game, featuring new wing colors, enhanced animations, updated UI, and countless levels to complete . Can you clear each level before time runs out? Collect coins to unlock new backgrounds and stunning butterfly wings in the updated shop! A relaxing, fun puzzle for all ages!
instructions: Connect matching butterflies in this engaging connect-2 game, Butterfly Kyodai Deluxe 2. Use hints and time freezes strategically to complete each level and enjoy the beautifully enhanced animations and UI as you play. Unlock and explore new wings and shop items with every win!

title: Screw Jam!
description: Let's embark on a mechanical journey like no other in Screw Jam Puzzle. Your mission is to untwist screws and put them in the right screw boxes. You win when completing all the screw sets. FEATURES - Addictive gameplay, help you relax and train your brain - ASMR Screw game: Beautiful design with satisfying in-game sounds This challenging and addictive Screw jam game will put your problem-solving skills to the test as you twist, turn, and put all the screws into right screw boxes.
instructions: - Remove screws in correct order to drop each board, one by one. - Fill each screw box with the same color screws, you need to fill all of them to win. - No time limit, relax and play whenever you want. - Unlimited levels! A lot of Nuts & Bolts strategies await you. - Multiple boosters can be used to support you in tricky situations

title: Knockout Dudes
description: Knockout Dudes is a very cute multiplayer racing game. You will race with other adorable chicks. There are many different and interesting modes you could choose to play. You have to beat others, Win the championship! I believe you will love this game!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Texas Holdem Poker
description: Players compete for winning combinations of cards using their skills and intuition. The game has the ability to bet, bluff and recognize the bluff of other players. Players can choose different difficulty levels and customize their own game rules. The unique interface design and realistic atmosphere allow you to immerse yourself in the world of card games and enjoy the excitement anytime and anywhere.
instructions: PC control: lmb Control on a mobile device: Touch

title: Gladiator Fights
description: An action game based on battles with gladiators, where players can plunge into the world of ancient Rome and become real warriors. The game offers an exciting and dynamic gameplay where players have to go through many challenges and defeat a number of dangerous opponents.
instructions: On mobile devices, the movement of a fighter is controlled by a joystick, attacks are activated by buttons.on the screen On a PC, the movement is carried out using the arrows on the keyboard or the WASD keys. Attacks are activated by mouse and keyboard buttons: A simple attack is the left mouse button or the "Space" key. Powerful attack - right mouse button or "Shift" key (any) Long-range attack - right mouse button or "Shift" key (any) Kick - clicking on the mouse wheel or the "Z" or "/" key

title: Screw Puzzle Master
description: Pull out the nuts and bolts and release the woods. Get ready for a fluent and entertaining screw puzzle! It is time to do some brain practice. Many game levels, entertaining puzzles, and super power-ups await you! Challenge a friend and complete chapters as fast as you can. Place the bolts as strategically as you can. Buy different skins and play in a different ambient.
instructions: On desktop devices: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK On mobile devices: Use Touch Controls to interact with the Nuts and Bolts.

title: Royal Bubble Blast
description: Welcome to Royal Bubble Blast, where you'll be transported to a majestic castle to enjoy a royal Bubble Shooter experience! Featuring vibrant, handcrafted designs and a colourful, lively theme, this game offers endless, relaxing gameplay accompanied by a beautiful soundtrack. Play as a King or Queen in the most exclusive Bubble Shooter enjoyed by royalty. Dive into a world of colourful bubbles and endless fun. So, what are you waiting for? Join the royals and start popping!
instructions: The goal of Royal Bubble Blast is to clear the board by matching three or more bubbles of the same colour. Aim using your mouse or finger, then shoot to pop the bubbles. The more you pop in a single shot, the higher your score. Avoid too many misses, as fouls will add a new line of bubbles at the top. Keep the bubbles from reaching the bottom of the screen for as long as you can. Keep popping and enjoy the fast-paced fun!

title: Bottle challenge
description: This is a puzzle game, the game provides different volumes of the kettle, according to the game level prompts each kettle needs a different magnitude, to reach the required magnitude of the prompt can be cleared
instructions: The main control of the game is to click on the water bottle to pour water into another water bottle
developer: Shenzhen haikuo yuntour rede tecnologia co., LTD

title: Merge Gun Fps Shooting Zombie
description: Merge Gun: FPS Shooting Zombie's main mission is to shoot down all coming undead creatures before they kill you. Before you join the battle, you can buy more guns and merge the same guns into new advanced ones. With more powerful and fast ammo in the clip, you can deal with incoming enemies more easily. Both zombies and crows will move forward to you even if you are still reloading. Keep calm and shoot the explosive oil cans on the ground if necessary.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Overprotective Boyfriend
description: Imagine the beautiful Princess Marie standing in front of a mirror, looking at her reflection. Her eyes are shining, and a sly smile plays on her lips. She is ready to put on an outfit that will emphasize her grace and charm. But then her lover appears and frowns: «My dear, are you really going to wear such an open dress?» Marie knows that her faithful knight sometimes takes too much care of her, but today she intends to look dazzling!
instructions: Help Princess Marie create a bright and daring outfit, but do not quarrel with her jealous lover. Combine bold challenge and quiet modesty in a single fashionable look! The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Ball Dunk Fall
description: In Ball Dunk Fall, your challenge is to guide a constantly falling ball through hoops of varying difficulties by tapping the screen. Test your precision and reflexes as you navigate through tricky obstacles. With each successful dunk, experience the thrill of victory and aim for high scores!
instructions: Objective: Pass the ball through as many hoops as possible while avoiding obstacles. Controls: Tap the screen to control the ball's direction as it falls. Gameplay: Time your taps to aim for the hoops. Avoid falling out of bounds and hitting obstacles to keep the game going.

title: Block Craft 3d
description: Block Craft 3D is a first-person RPG game with 3D pixel Minecraft models. Starting from a block base, you can attack the monsters outside to claim diamonds with weapons. I strongly suggest you build bombs to destroy terrains or build blocks to make yourself safe. When you earn enough diamonds, you can unlock and use 4 Melee weapons, 11 guns, and 8 bombs in the store. Glad you will have a good time in this block world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hidden Objects Bakery
description: Explore 6 charming bakery shops in this fun hidden object game! With 24 exciting levels, find 6 hidden bakery items in each shop before time runs out. Perfect for all ages, enjoy the challenge and discover delicious treats in every corner. Can you find them all before time runs out?
instructions: Use your mouse or tap the screen to select hidden bakery items scattered throughout the shop. Scroll with your mouse to explore different sections of the shop and discover all the hidden treats.

title: Shopaholic Black Friday
description: Experience fashion fun like never before with the Shopaholic Black Friday game! Navigate through makeup products, and indulge in chic fashion pieces. Hit the mall, shop as many items as you can before the time runs out, and then return for another styling adventure. Explore an array of lipstick hues, experiment with smoky eyes, or go for colorful shadows, and browse through fashionable dresses, trendy tops, and stylish shoes. Complete the look with dazzling accessories and designer bags.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Pursuit Rampage
description: In Pursuit Rampage, you’re behind the wheel of a police car in an endless, high-speed chase. Navigate through busy streets, dodge obstacles, and close in on criminals while keeping your cool under pressure. The game constantly pushes your reflexes to the limit, with each second offering a new challenge. Whether you're weaving through traffic or speeding down back alleys, the action never lets up.
instructions: WASD/Arrow to Drive H for Horn C for Camera

title: Zombie Space Episode II
description: There has been an outbreak of a zombie virus on a space station. The first group of mercenaries has disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You will have to fight with a horde of zombies, using different types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use your characters' abilities in heated battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or alone!
instructions: The goal of the game is to destroy all zombies and monsters. Find new weapons in the boxes. Upgrade characters and weapons to defeat strong enemies. Q (K) - change weapons; W, A, S, D (arrows) - move; E (M) - apply / activate; F (J) - super weapon. LeftCntrl, Space (RightControl, KeyPad 0) - shooting; Mouse - look / shoot; For mobile devices, use touch input.

title: Day of Atrocity
description: Day of Atrocity is a voxel action game where you play as the hero, battling a relentless swarm of enemies that spawn at an increasing pace. Your objective is to stop them from overtaking the map by wiping them out before they dominate the entire space.
instructions: Controls: Control movement with WASD keys Dash with L key Attack with O and P keys Tab key to change character

title: Geometry Arrow
description: Dive into an exhilarating journey through a treacherous cave! Your mission: reach the portal at the end of each level while avoiding deadly spikes and obstacles. With six progressively harder levels, you’ll need sharp reflexes and spot-on timing to survive. Can you conquer every challenge and make it out of the cave? Put your skills to the test in this high-speed action game!
instructions: PC controls: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or SPACEBAR ─ arrow movement MOBILE controls: TOUCHING THE SCREEN ─ arrow movement

title: Cosmo Puzzle
description: Play Cosmo Puzzle online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Candy Cascade
description: Click on groups of two or more candies to destroy them. You need to collect certain amount of different sweets on every level. Wooden blocks, honey and jam should be cleared from the game field. If there is a key on the game field it should be dropped down. The moves are limited for each level. If you have hard time with a task you can use bonuses that can be received when you collect jam.
instructions: Destroy tiles by tapping on a group of them.

title: Canasta Royale Offline
description: Canasta is the most traditional and loved card game by all. It is an exciting mix of strategy, luck and skill.Canasta uses two complete decks of 52 playing cards (French Deck) plus the four Jokers. All the Jokers and twos are wild cards. Game Features: ★ 2 or 4 players ★ Clockwise or Counter-Clockwise ★ Game is automatically saved each turn, so you can close it and continue playing later ★ Undo function so you can cancel mistaken melds
instructions: Left mouse button
